descriptions: (bool) cheats: Unlocks cheat commands. Advancements are disabled.
(bool) freecam: Allows the camera to move around freely using the mouse.
(number) p_speed: The speed of the player.
(bool) g_vignette: Vignette effect.
(number) s_language: Has no use for now (v0.2.dev2).
(bool) noclip: Disables map collisions for player.
(bool) god: Makes the player invincible.
(bool) invisible: Makes NPC's unable to detect the presence of player.
(bool) inf_stamina: Enables endless sprinting.
(number) slippiness: Determines how slippery the player movement is.
(number) stamina_fill: How fast the stamina energy fills up to 100.
(number) stamina_drain: How fast the stamina energy drains during sprinting.
(bool) fullbright: Disables lights if set to true.

assign [key] [command]:
	Assigns a console command to a key to instantly run it in-game.

run_script [file_path]:
	Runs commands at the given text file.

give_ammo:
	Adds a magazine of ammo at the current weapon the player is holding.

clear:
	Clears the developer console history.

give [weaponName]:
	Replaces the current slot of player with specified weapon.

info:
	Returns some information about the game and the engine.

bind [inputName] [key]:
	Changes the primary input key of a binding.

map [mapName]:
	Loads a map file contained in "assets/maps".

maps:
	Returns a list of maps in game directory.

hurtme:
	Damages the player.

hurtarmor:
	Damages player armor.

restart:
	Restarts the game.

summon [name]:
	Spawns an NPC in front of the player.

newprop [name]:
	Spawns a prop in front of the player.

newitem [name]:
	Spawns an item in front of the player.

tp [x] [y]:
	Teleports the player to the given coordinates.

scene [scene]:
	Loads a scene file.

scenes:
	Returns a list of scenes in the game directory.
